title: "Glory Star Signs Agreement With GTCOM Entertainment to Empower Consumption Through AI Technology"
excerpt: "In light of the growing market demand and consumption growth, Glory Star signed the Agreement with GTCOM Entertainment to integrate resources from both parties. Under the Agreement, GTCOM Entertainment will provide to Glory Star access to AI and certain computer technology."
